Arctic Energy Frontiers with Bathsheba Demuth

02 Oct 2020

Bathsheba Demuth on her monumental book Floating Coast: An Environmental History of the Bering Strait. From the 19th century through today, governments and capitalists on the Russian, Soviet, and American Arctic borderlands extract energy from a natural world whose reproductive cycles they donâ€™t comprehend and strive to convert Indigenous people into national subjects.
